snippet.title: Spiritfall - Gameplay Teaser
snippet.description:
Spiritfall combines Hack and Slash combat, nimble platform brawling, and Rogue-lite mechanics into one!
Slash, smash, launch, and wall-splat a multitude of enemies using an ever-changing arsenal of divine powers.
Traverse dangerous regions and unleash deadly combos through a randomly generated map.

WISHLIST ON STEAM
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1835240/

Follow us to learn more (Discord/Twitter/Instagram/Facebook):
https://www.gentlegiantgames.com/
